title: Setup a Payment Arrangement
description: A customer is unable to pay their full bill and requests to set up a payment arrangement.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their outstanding balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer and the amount due.

tasks.description: Check the customer's eligibility for a payment arrangement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer is eligible based on their account history.

tasks.description: Propose a standard payment plan (e.g., 3 monthly installments) and process it upon customer agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up the payment plan in the system.
